synopsis.text: Shown on Fuji Television, this anime presents a unique blend of history and animation, with each three-minute episode highlighting significant historical events that occurred on the same date. The protagonist, who is unaware of the historical happenings, embarks on a journey of discovery. To enhance the learning experience, the anime incorporates photographs and film footage sourced from the Mainichi Shimbun newspaper, where the director's Fuku-chan manga was being published concurrently. This engaging approach to history education aims to captivate viewers and spark their curiosity about the past.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
